author: aandvalenzuela
body:
Changes needed to set ROOT628 IB.
See also new `IB/CMSSW_13_0_X/root628` branch (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/tree/IB/CMSSW_13_0_X/root628) in `cmsdist` repo  (changes in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/blob/IB/CMSSW_13_0_X/root628/root.spec).
New branch for `cms-sw/root` at https://github.com/cms-sw/root/tree/cms/v6-28-00-patches/b249caa477.
title: Set up IB for ROOT v6.28
